title: $1,200 / 1br - Sunny 1 bedroom apartment in West Philly
description:
Available July 29, 2022.
Beautiful 1 bedroom on Hazel near 52nd
842 ft2
$1200 rent + $40 water (regardless of usage)
Tenant pays all their own utilities (gas, electric, internet)
The apartment is the entire second floor of a 100-year-old house. The street entrance and hallway up to the 2rd floor entrance is shared with two neighbors.
There are two entrances to the apartment - into the kitchen & into the living room.
The living room has a door that can be used for privacy from the kitchen and can double as a guest room or be used for roommates (with two separate applications).
Hardwood & tile floors (no carpet).
Apartment features:
- 2 large bedroom closets & 1 living room closet
-Windows on 3 sides of apartment
-Free shared laundry in the basement - 2 washers, 1 dryer
-Current tenant wants to sell the blue couch in the photo if you are interested
- Radiator heating. Dedicated hot water heater and boiler with individual utility account (resident only pays for their specific use for electric and natural gas)
-Appliances are fairly new (2015).
Cat allowed with a pet deposit
Neighborhood features:
Near the most reliable transit line - the MFL.
Lots of street parking
Many businesses & restaurants very close on S 52nd St & Baltimore Ave.
Mariposa Food Co-op & other groceries in walking distance.
Apartment is managed by the owner who is responsive to maintenance issues and lives nearby.
Viewings will be available starting June 6.
Application requirements:
Potential tenant will pay $42 for application fee.
Credit score of 650+. No past evictions.
Reference from current landlord.
Deposit is double the rent.
The lease is offered on a yearly basis. Preference may be given to applicants who are interested in living here longer-term.
This is an equal housing opportunity, regardless of age, color, gender, sexual orientation, nationality or any other demographic not mentioned. You will be more than welcome as a resident if you can appreciate living in a 100 year home, demonstrate respect for the other residents and the property itself, and be thoughtful and considerate regarding noise.
If interested, please reply to this post and include some information about yourself and what brings you to West Philly.

title: contemporary luxury 1 BR with garage parking (entirely renovated)
description:
Available August 1st. Completely renovated 1 contemporary bed/1 bath, 900 sq ft condo which includes 1 garage parking spot. Located in the Pier 3 building on the scenic Delaware waterfront. The unit has 13 foot ceilings and has been completely redone: new natural hardwood floors throughout, high end tile and shower in the bathroom, new appliances & granite counter in kitchen. New custom window treatments and lighting throughout. Central air, washer/dryer in unit.
This 2nd floor condo is situated at the very end of the pier, far enough to drown out noise of the bustling city but close enough to all the action in Penn's Landing and Old City. You will have your own private patio. The amenities include a 24 hour concierge, year-round indoor heated pool, gym, garage parking, and a sprawling community deck with beautiful South/East views of the river/city. You will not find a place with this much access to the water in the city.
Location is excellent. The entire Deleware River waterfront has just been renovated with a beautiful walking/biking trail. 5 minute walk to historic and trendy old city and a 2 minute walk to Penn's Landing Plaza which has fun activities year round (Spruce Street harbor, ice skating, park, museums, and restaurants…check out the new Liberty Point for a great outdoor happy hour). Very close to public transport and 1 minute drive to exit onto 95 N.
Application Fee $50. 1 month rent, and 1 month security deposit due at time of lease signing. Renter pays all utilities, water, and gas.

title: Studio Apartment Home on Rittenhouse Square, Wood Floors, Gym, Lounge
description:
The studio apartment home at 1110 is available for lease at this moment! This renovated kitchen features white cabinets and granite countertops. This kitchen is fully-equipped with a dishwasher, disposal, microwave, and gas stove. This home has wood floors. This home on the 11th floor features large windows that face south and have a view of Chancellor Street. The Rittenhouse Claridge is located on Rittenhouse Square. Move into your new home immediately!
The Rittenhouse Claridge offers you the opportunity to live in Philadelphia’s most vibrant, walkable neighborhood. So close to shopping, dining, and more! Go grocery shopping at the Rittenhouse Market, Trader Joe's, Giant, Target, or Di Bruno Bros. Browse the books at Barnes & Noble. Shop at the retail stores on Rittenhouse Row such as Anthropologie, Lagos, Tumi, Lovesac, Athleta, lululemon, Indochino, Madewell, and Paper Source. Experience fine dining at Rouge, Devon, Parc, Barclay Prime, or Pietro's. Savor a coffee at La Colombe or Ultimo. Indulge in a French dessert at Miel Patisserie. Savor scoops of gelato from Gran Caffe L'Aquila. Have ice cream at Van Leeuwen. Stroll across the park and then buy a loaf of French Table at Metropolitan Bakery. Grab scones from The Bakeshop on 20th. Catch a show at the Kimmel Center. Wander around the Rodin Museum. Shop at the weekly farmer's market every Saturday and Tuesday. There is so much to do in this area!
Community Amenities:
* Top-of-the-line fitness center with park view
* 8,000 square foot resident lounge with free wifi
* Sauna
* Pet-friendly building complete with a dog spa! Please note that certain restrictions apply.
* Fitness/yoga studio
* Package lockers
* Bike storage
* Amazing roof deck with fantastic views
* Nightly guest suites for the family and friends of current residents
* Elevator building with 24/7 front door attendant and concierge desk staff
* 24/7 maintenance
* Laundry room on every floor
* Larger laundry facility on the 3rd floor
* Attached valet parking garage! Please note that these parking spaces are not owned nor managed by community and the cost is separate.
Apartment Home Features:
* Studio apartment home on 11th floor
* Dishwasher
* Gas stove
* Microwave
* Disposal
* White kitchen cabinets
* Granite kitchen countertops
* Wood floor
* Large windows that face south
* Chancellor Street view
* All utilities included (except cable and internet)
Wondering if this home is still available? Visit our website at rittenhouseclaridge.com to see if 1110 is still listed under the Dali floor plan. If interested, then please make an appointment to tour using Resmate, our chatbot concierge, on our website 24/7. Live virtual tours on FaceTime and in Zoom available!
Move-In Special!
If you apply today, reserve a studio apartment home, elect a 10 to 22 month lease term, and move in on or before July 1, 2022, then take $500.00 off your prorated rent. New residents only. Certain restriction apply. Limited time offer.
Rittenhouse Claridge
201 South 18th Street
Philadelphia, PA 19103
Price posted is for the 22 month lease term.
1-22 month lease terms available!
Rental rates, availability, and apartment home features are subject to change without notice.
Welcome home!

title: Charming Single Family Home in Kennett Square, PA
description: Come and enjoy borough living at it's best!  Welcome to 415 W. Cypress St, a 3 BR/1.5 BA mid-century brick cape with great charm and character! This home features plenty of off street parking and a nice, large yard....both rare for the borough!  This delightful cape features beautiful hardwood flooring throughout, fresh paint, and a new roof. Main floor of the home features living room, dining room, kitchen, bedroom, powder room along with a breezeway which leads to a very large, updated family room.  Family room has been updated with new flooring, fresh paint, new ceiling and new mini-split unit! Upstairs of this home features two additional large bedrooms along with a full bath.  Basement is unfinished and features an outside entrance!  This lovely home is located just blocks to downtown Kennett Square and all of the restaurants, shoppes, festivals and events that historic Kennett Square has to offer!

description:
Located in the crux of Center City, South Philadelphia, and University City, Graduate Pointe, located at 2501 Washington Avenue, offers all the amenities of a luxe lifestyle with the ease and convenience that our bustling city has to offer.
Our 1 and 2 bedroom apartments are beautifully designed with modern fixtures and finishes, a full appliance package, and brand new hardwood floors. Extra large windows showcase a wealth of natural light, beaming throughout the open floor concept. Balconies are available in select residences.

Covered parking is offered for an additional fee.

title: This building is safely centrally located to all that Philadelphia
description: Welcome to Locust Point. This building is safely centrally located to all that Philadelphia has to offer. In walking distance to the shops and restaurants of Rittenhouse, this unit sits in a prime location. To the west, sits the Schuylkill River Park, trail, and dog park for a bunch of fun outdoor activities. If you go just over the river, you have access to University City's sports leagues (soccer, baseball, flag football, frisbee, tennis) at Penn's Field. To the North, you have the Philadelphia Museum of Art and loads of other museums and galleries. Inside is a spacious loft with an in-unit washer and dryer. Perfect for city living, the ceilings are high, the windows are large, and there is plenty of space to unwind. The unit comes with a pre-installed tv wall mount, floating cabinet beneath tv, and dishwasher. Make sure to take advantage of the building's gym (free to all residents). While there is no on-site parking for this unit, there is a full-time, covered, secure parking garage available around the corner (less than 1-minute walk) for $200/month. Bike parking available. In addition to the closet space in the unit, there is additional private storage space on the same floor. Pets accepted on a case by case basis, with an additional $50/month fee. There is a fenced-in pet grass area in front of the building for exercise/bathroom activity.

description: Spacious 2 bedroom , 1.5 Baths, Finished Basement, complete with a finished basement with an additional room and a large backyard in the coveted Graduate Hospital Area. Nestled away on a quiet block, enter this home into the open living room/dining room, a perfect set up for both everyday living and entertaining. Past the living room, you will enter the upscale kitchen with stainless steel appliances and granite counter tops, ample storage and a perfectly-placed powder room.
